metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14846 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
In Ansible, all Ansible Engine versions up to ansible-engine 2.8.5,ansible-engine 2.7.13, ansible-engine 2.6.19, were logging at the DEBUGlevel which lead to a disclosure of credentials if a plugin used a librarythat logged credentials at the DEBUG level. This flaw does not affectAnsible modules, as those are executed in a separate process.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.8.6+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.6+dfsg-1').
